make do.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to manage with the things that you have, even though this is not really enough
make do.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: I hardly had any food in the house so I just had to make do.
For many people, make do and mend (=when someone manages with the things they have and does not buy anything new) was a harsh reality.
I usually make do with a cup of coffee for breakfast.
